ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_2times | |- ( A e. CC -> ( 2 x. A ) = ( A + A ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( A e. CC -> ( sin ` ( 2 x. A ) ) = ( sin ` ( A + A ) ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_coscl | |- ( A e. CC -> ( cos ` A ) e. CC ) |
| 4 |  | #P_sincl | |- ( A e. CC -> ( sin ` A ) e. CC ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_mulcomd | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( sin ` A ) ) = ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` A ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` A ) ) + ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( sin ` A ) ) ) = ( ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` A ) ) + ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_sinadd | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ A e. CC ) -> ( sin ` ( A + A ) ) = ( ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` A ) ) + ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( sin ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_anidms | |- ( A e. CC -> ( sin ` ( A + A ) ) = ( ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` A ) ) + ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( sin ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 9 | 4, 3 | #P_mulcld | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` A ) ) e. CC ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_2timesd | |- ( A e. CC -> ( 2 x. ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` A ) ) ) = ( ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` A ) ) + ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 11 | 6, 8, 10 | #P_3eqtr4d | |- ( A e. CC -> ( sin ` ( A + A ) ) = ( 2 x. ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 12 | 2, 11 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( A e. CC -> ( sin ` ( 2 x. A ) ) = ( 2 x. ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` A ) ) ) ) |
